nodes.text: LOL; what a silly attempt to solicit sympathy and total load of BS. Like the 'little ones' are really that interested in the political greed of gay activism. Heck, most kids don't have to be taught that gay relationships aren't normal--they have more sense sometimes than a lot of adults in this country.
Really? Funny, my son, even before I 'came out' didn't think gays were bad or being gay was bad. He saw hate as being the real evil...and you exemplify that just perfectly...brava! emoticon_rolleyes
